attributes.action: Have a working class person as prime minister
attributes.additional_details: LISTEN LISTEN AND LISTEN SOME MORE. There are other people in this country not just the rich. I'm a key worker on 9.99 per hour and its not enough .Help the working class before its too late. We will only put up with this scandalous way of life for so long before the country breaks in two
attributes.background: I want the elected officials to recognise that over 60% of the country are poor working class.All our elected officials are born into money so they don't know how to survive on 300 per week.we need someone in charge who knows how to live 9n the bread line.Here are some examples of what you could
